title.bibl: Russkii Viestnik (Russian Herald), March 20, 1926. A Lecture at the Russian Center

div.bibl: Russkii Viestnik (Russian Herald), March 20, 1926. A LECTURE AT THE RUSSIAN CENTER

body.p: On Sunday, March 21, in the large hall of the House of Enlightenment, 1080 W. 14th Street, Mr. Grigoriy Senkevich will read a paper on "The Economic Situation in Modern Russia" (based on material derived from Soviet sources). After the reading of the paper, there is expected to be a lively discussion in which representatives of all shades of political views existing among the members of the Russian colony of Chicago are invited to participate.
Beginning at 2 P. M. Admission free of charge.
